commands.description: Create hostpath for WordPress and MariaDB PVs
commands.exec: sudo mkdir -p /bitnami/mariadb/data && sudo chown -R 1001:1001 /bitnami/mariadb/data && sudo mkdir -p /bitnami/wordpress/wp-content && sudo chown -R 1001:1001 /bitnami/wordpress/wp-content && sudo mkdir /data && sudo chown -R 1001:1001 /data
cd /home/student/projects && git clone https://github.com/aradhana14nov/Wordpress-Helm-Chart && cd Wordpress-Helm-Chart && kubectl create -f mariadbpv.yaml && kubectl create -f wordpresspv.yaml
helm install wordpress bitnami/wordpress --set securityContext.runAsUser=0 --set securityContext.fsGroup=0 --values=wordpress-values.yaml --namespace wordpress
